Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 34.
_description: A macaronic carol of the Nativity — five quatrains with burden: ‘Make we ioye nowe in this fest / In quo Cristus natus est / Eya’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
A patre vnigenitus þorw a maiden is com to vsSyng we to
                    here and sey wel comeVeni redemptor gentium…

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
A patre vnigenitus to a maydyn is cum to vsSyng we of hym & sey
                    wolen veni redemptor gencium…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Oliue beata trinitas þat lay be twyn an ox an a asBy hys
                    modyr maydyn fre gloria tibi domine
BodEngPoete1.Note:
Written, as given above, in long lines with leonine rhyme, that is, two
                    lines of verse per line in the MS.
